resources.string: This app is basically for those who wants to keep track of their daily cost. Someone who is very bad at maintaining budget, this app is to give him a option to look on the fields where he spends his money. It will allow to input the daily expenses for the current month and will show you an overview in the saving plan section that how much your expense is and did you fail to maintain your budget or not. Cheers !!!
Who is your childhood sports hero?
What was your favorite food as a child?
